OUTLINE : This multicenter , dose-escalation study alemtuzumab . - Group 1 : Patients receive escalate dos alemtuzumab IV 2 hour weekly 8 week maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) determine . - Group 2 : Patients receive escalate dos alemtuzumab subcutaneously weekly 8 week , begin MTD determine group 1 second MTD determine . Patients undergo bone marrow blood sample collection periodically laboratory pharmacokinetic study . Samples analyze minimal residual disease T-cell subset ( i.e. , CD4 CD8 ) via quantitative-PCR analysis flow cytometry cytomegalovirus antigens via PCR .
